channel.title: 508 cache directory :S

item.title: 508 cache directory :S
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

I made a topic in a forum but I didn’t get pretty much help there.
I just copy the stuff here I need help with:

"I have my own server and client. I want to send the client to my friends, but they have to download cache seperately. How can I do so that the Cache will be in my client files?
Not in C:\cache508\rs2 but in My Documents:\Client:\cache508\rs2 … ???
FOR THAT I GOT MY ANSWER … ALMOST!
This is in signlink.java
/Do i have to use _ instead of space?
//{ “c:/program files/messenger/508/508 RSPS/cache508/rs2” };
//or
/{ “c:/program_files/messenger/508/508_RSPS/cache508/rs2” };
IGNORE THE MSG ABOVE

But if i put this:
{ “c:/program files/messenger/508/508 RSPS/cache508/rs2” };
and i send to my friends then they obviously download client to desktop probably …
then they must change the cache directory … how could i do it so they doesn’t have to change it."

Pls!

Read full topic
